DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether calcium citrate calcium carbonate optimal supplement treat secondary hyperparathyroidism follow Roux-en-Y gastric bypass operation . Half participant randomize receive calcium citrate , half receive calcium carbonate . The study double blind .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Optimal Calcium Supplement Following Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass
DOC.criteria: RouxenY gastric bypass operation â‰¥12 month ago Parathyroid hormone > 6.9 pmol/l Vitamin D > 50 nmol/l PCalcium [ 1.181.32 ] mmol/l Liver disease Renal disease Hypercalcemia Untreated thyroid disease Parathyroid disease except secondary hyperparathyroidism Use diuretic , bisphosphonates , calcitonin , teriparatide , oral corticosteroid , anabolic steroid , calcimimetics , lithium , strontium , denosumab anticonvulsant within 1 year inclusion abuse alcohol
